Trade/Device Name(s): ELITech Clinical Systems ALP IFCC SL
Regulation Name(s): Alkaline Phosphatase or Isoenzymes Test System
Methodologies: Measurement of the rate of production of p-nitrophenol at 405 nm
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ELITech Clinical Systems ALP IFCC SL colorimetric reagent kit for quantitative determination of alkaline phosphatase in serum/plasma on Selectra analyzers
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative in vitro diagnostic determination of alkaline phosphatase in human serum and plasma on ELITech Clinical Systems Selectra analyzers to aid in diagnosis and treatment of liver, bone, parathyroid, and intestinal diseases; not for Point of Care use.
